      Description: this method corresponds to register add user in general, with the parameters of characterize
      Parameters:
      typeUser - (int ) the type of user producer
      name - (String) the name of the person
      photo - (String) the String of url for the picture
      numVisualization - (int ) the num of visualization for the content
      fecha - (String) the particular date at the moment of registration in the user
      nickname - (String) nickname particular for each user most be unic
      cc - (String) id or number identification for each user most be unic
      Returns:
      (String) message of user create successfully

    • addContent

      public String addContent(String name, String description, int category, String urlCoverPage, double duration, int reproductionNumber, int number)
      Description: this method register the content (podcast) for a user producer (creator content)
      Parameters:
      name - (String) name of the article/ podcast
      description - (String) description of the podcast
      category - (int) category selec for the tyoe of podcast
      urlCoverPage - (String) the url for the image png cover
      duration - (double ) the time of duration for the podcast
      reproductionNumber - (int) the total number of reproductions for the pocast
      number - (int) identification
      Returns:
      (register) object

    • addContent

      public String addContent(String name, String url, double length, int numRep, String album, double price, int numSold, int genre, int number)
      Description : this method register content (Song) for a user producer (artist)
      Parameters:
      name - (String) name fo the song
      url - (String) url coverpage for the song
      length - (double) duration of the song
      numRep - (int) total number of repetitions for the song
      album - (String) album of the song
      price - (doouble) price of the song
      numSold - (int) num of sold units for the song
      genre - (int) option type for genre of the song
      number - (int) identification
      Returns:
      (register) object
